key_responsibilities: Lead generative and clustering analytics on GCP, leveraging GPT-4o mini for summarization and Vertex AI for model training, achieving <2% noise reduction in enterprise data.
Designed end-to-end NLP pipelines with ‘intfloat/e5‘ embeddings and hybrid clustering (UMAP, HDBSCAN) for PII detection and entity masking.
Fine-tuning generative models for multi-source data summarization and building hybrid geospatial visualization systems using ArcGIS and Weaviate/MongoDB.
Deployed a client-side AI proctoring system using TensorFlow.js and MediaPipe, leveraging WebGPU for real-time analysis to reduce server costs and scale to thousands of users.
Developed a facial recognition system using Siamese Neural Networks for a B2B AI-driven interview platform, enabling one-shot image recognition and improving performance with data augmentation.

projects.name: GenAgent-Personalized-Career-Assistant-Powered-by-Agentic-AI
projects.description: Architected a full-stack AI career assistant (FastAPI, Streamlit) providing data-driven resume feedback and job application tools. Engineered a multi-feature platform using LLM agents (GPT-4) for resume analysis, rewriting, and cover letter generation. Containerized the application using Docker, ensuring reproducible builds and simplifying deployment.

projects.name: AI Medical Chatbot Using Llama 2
projects.description: Engineered a RAG medical chatbot using Llama 2 and LangChain to provide accurate answers from a PDF knowledge base. Implemented a FAISS vector database, achieving 95% retrieval accuracy and reducing response latency by 50%.

projects.name: AI Large-Scale Candidate Recommendation System
projects.description: Developed a scalable candidate-job matching system using GPT-4o mini and advanced prompt engineering. Built a resume parsing pipeline to minimize input size, reducing inference cost and time.

publications.title: EduNote: AI-Powered Cultural and Location-Based Note Generation from Images
publications.description: Developed an AI tool to transform images of landmarks into travel notes using a fine-tuned DenseNet121 model and APIs (Wikipedia, TripAdvisor). Achieved 88.83% classification accuracy and a 0.91 F1-score on 20 Indian monuments by optimizing the model and using LLaMA3-70B for text generation.
